name: tlog-monorepo
description: Monorepo for tlog CLI, MCP server, VS Code extension, and shared libraries.

scripts.build: npm run --workspace @tlog/shared build && npm run --workspace @tlog/cli build && npm run --workspace @tlog/mcp build && npm run --workspace vscode-tlog build
scripts.typecheck: npm run --workspace @tlog/shared typecheck && npm run --workspace @tlog/cli typecheck && npm run --workspace @tlog/mcp typecheck && npm run --workspace vscode-tlog typecheck
scripts.test: npm run --workspace @tlog/shared test && npm run --workspace @tlog/cli test && npm run --workspace @tlog/mcp test && npm run --workspace vscode-tlog test
scripts.test:coverage: npm run --workspace @tlog/shared test:coverage && npm run --workspace @tlog/cli test:coverage && npm run --workspace @tlog/mcp test:coverage && npm run --workspace vscode-tlog test:coverage
